CustomField.description: If this field is checked, p2s_base1__CampaignAttribution__c records will not be created by Dash. They will be created by the Engagio integration of Campaign and Activity data
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is checked, p2s_base1__CampaignAttribution__c records will not be created by Dash. They will be created by the Engagio integration of Campaign and Activity data
CustomField.label: Use Engagio Attribution
